title: File new hire report?
description: Most states require that employers file a new hire report for contractors within 20 days of their start date. Even if the report is overdue, it is generally better to file a late report than to risk penalties for being out of compliance.
doFileLegend: Select whether or not you'd like us to file new hire report
yesOption: Yes, file the report for me
noOption: No, I have already filed or will file the report myself
